# Tailwind CSS for R

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/tjpalanca/tailwind.R/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/tjpalanca/tailwind.R?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that can be used to build any 
kind of design directly in the markup. This package allows R users to build 
Tailwind CSS pages.
